ValidationRule.description: Contact Result cannot be booked for completed calls or meetings
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(Contains(Current_User_Profile__c,"Webdam")), ISPICKVAL(Contact_Result__c, "Booked"), OR ( ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Call"), ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Demo / Online Meeting"), ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Face-to-Face Meeting")), ISPICKVAL (Status, "Completed"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The contact result for completed calls or meetings cannot be "Booked". Please adjust the contact result.
